name: Legeclo: Legend Clover
description:
Legeclo is a tactical RPG to save the world from the crisis that is about to come again with the heroes called ""Legends"".

Players can watch stories and challenge battles with the Legends, commanding them to defeat the ""Abyss"".
In battle, the turn switched between ally & enemy phases. Once the characters moves or attacks, the phase changes to the enemy's turn.
The stage is cleared when all the enemies are defeated.

In the Story page, players can re-view the main story, and also see character-specific scenarios.
Watch the special scenarios to know about the Legends.

Game plot

Save the world from the crisis that is about to come again with the heroes called ""Legends"" who are legendary beings!
Heroes with rich personalities with beautiful illustrations!
Let's find your favorite heroine!

Enjoy deep combat with easy controls that even beginners can enjoy!

Your strategy is limitless! Each action will determine your destiny!

A Full Range Of Challenging Elements!

Develop your favorite character with a variety of training elements!
Run around the vast world with your favorite girls!

Even that person you all know has become a beautiful girl...?
Now, let Jeanne, the girl of destiny, lead you to the story where you will become a hero!
